author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- This avoids dealocking the system in the case a unix signal occurs in the external GeneratorFilter's constructor.
- Now handle both std::terminate and early exit being called from the generator

A new unit test was added to test the various failure routes are all handled properly.

#### PR validation:

The code compiles and the new unit test passes.
title: Handle more generator problems in external generator
